channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Saturday Mash-Up! Live
channel.desc: Race Across the World stars Fin and Sioned journey to the Mash-Up studio for a morning of fun, the Lewis Sisters perform their latest tune, and there are two episodes of SpongeBob SquarePants! Also, Mash-Up fans talk gaming in the return of Eat, Sleep, Game, Review, there?s Bog Off, Awful Coffee, and lots of slime! Saturday Mash-Up is totally live... so anything can happen.
